servinfo.title: Oil Pump, Oil Pump Chain and Gasket Holder Plate Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Oil Pump, Oil Pump Chain and Gasket Holder Plate Component

attention2.ptxt: Never disassemble oil pump. Disassembly will spoil its original function. If faulty condition is found, replace it with new one.

s1.ptxt: Remove oil pan and oil pump strainer referring to Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Removal and Installation .
Remove oil pump (1) from cylinder block.
Remove timing belt and crankshaft timing pulley referring to Timing Belt and Belt Tensioner Removal and Installation .
Remove gasket holder plate (1) from cylinder block.
Remove oil pump chain (1) and oil pump drive sprocket (2).
Remove crankshaft oil seal (1) from gasket holder plate (2).
Remove oil pump chain tensioner (3) from gasket holder plate, if necessary.

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Oil Pump, Oil Pump Chain and Gasket Holder Plate Inspection

s1.ptxt: Remove oil and dust from mating surfaces of oil pump drive sprocket, crankshaft gasket holder plate and cylinder block.
Install oil pump chain tensioner (1) to gasket holder plate (2), if removed.
Install oil pump drive sprocket (1) with oil pump chain (2).
Install gasket holder plate (1) with new gasket to cylinder block.
Install oil pump (1) and tighten oil pump bolts to specified torque.
Install oil pan and oil pump strainer referring to Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Removal and Installation .
Install new crankshaft oil seal to gasket holder plate using special tool as follows.

s2.ptxt: Fit new oil seal (1) to special tool.
Install oil seal tapping special tool with a plastic hammer.

s1.ptxt: Install timing belt referring to Timing Belt and Belt Tensioner Removal and Installation .
